meaning_str.bing:
adj. 主要的；最重要的；基本的；最初的
n. （美国）初选
网络. 初级的；小学；原发性

主要的；最重要的；基本的；最初的

首要的；主要的；最初的；最早的；原始的；原本的；基本的；初级的；初等的；小学的；初等教育的；小学教育的；一级的；一次的
（美国）初选；预选举；基本色；原色；主要星体；主星；初级线圈；原线圈；初级飞羽；第一级飞羽

1.en: Such an administrative structure seems to well solve the insufficiency of primary care and inefficiency of special care at present.
1.cn: 这样的管理结构从目前来看较好的解决了初级卫生服务供给不足和专科卫生服务效率低下的问题。

2.en: An examination of the collapse of Xinjian Primary School offers a disturbing picture of a calamity that might have been avoided.
2.cn: 对新建小学倒塌事件的调查显示，这场灾难本是可以避免的。这个结论可能会让部分人感到头疼不已。

3.en: David Shaff, administrator of the city water bureau, said, the yuck factor was the primary reason for the decision.
3.cn: 波特兰水务局官员大卫•沙夫表示，做出这个决定的主要原因是因为感到恶心。

0.en: What's in the spray specifically? The primary ingredient is Bacitracin.
0.cn: 等等，这个喷雾的主要成分是什么？喷雾的主要成分是"杆菌肽"。

1.en: Well, that is one of my degrees. My primary field is neuroscience.
1.cn: 是我的学位之一，我的主修是神经系统学。

2.en: It's talc. But as that's a primary ingredient of baby powder, I understand your confusion.
2.cn: 是滑石粉，但由于滑石粉是婴儿爽身粉的原材料，你会搞错也是人之常情。

3.en: Where am I? This is the Alcazar of Kalique Abrasax, second primary of the house of Abrasax.
3.cn: 这是哪？这里是凯莉克阿拜萨斯的城堡，是阿拜萨斯的第二大城堡。

4.en: And I have to say, everyone's primary focus right now needs to be on the Miller family, not this.
4.cn: 而且我得说，大家现在应该首要关注米勒一家，而非此事。

5.en: I work for an organization whose primary purpose is not space travel. It's reshaping wrongdoings.
5.cn: 我所工作的组织，其主首要目标不是探索太空而是修正历史错误。

6.en: No, I'm not here for the primary. I'm here to run for the 30th, and I want you to run my campaign.
6.cn: 不，我不是为初选而来的，我想竞选30选区议员，我希望你做我的竞选经理。

7.en: When Claire first came down here to Dallas, we said it was to lay the groundwork for the Texas primary.
7.cn: 克莱尔最初来到达拉斯时，我们说是为德州的初选打基础。

8.en: My primary concern with being granted tenure is living with an insanely jealous roommate after the fact.
8.cn: 我最大担心的是，在拿到终身教职后，还得跟超嫉妒我的室友同住一个屋檐下。

9.en: Huge IQ, great performance in primary school. And it all went tits up. Drugs, petty crime, never had a job.
9.cn: 高智商，小学时表现极为出色，然后一落千丈。吸毒，小偷小摸，游手好闲。

10.en: Then, when we started, the hosts' emotions were primary colors. Love, hate. I wanted all the shades in between.
10.cn: 我们研究之初，接待员的情感都如原色单调，喜爱，厌恶，我希望在其中加入所有的颜色。

11.en: With our primary fleet engaged in the Laurentian system, I hereby order all cadets to report to hangar 1 immediately. Dismissed.
11.cn: 除在劳伦星系执勤的舰队，现在我要求所有学员马上前往第一库区。解散。

12.en: There are three primary theories concerning sediment flow rate. Each of these theories can be further sub-categorized into two distinct...
12.cn: 沉积速率有三个主要理论，每一个还可以细分为两个…

13.en: Oh. Okay. Okay. There are three primary theories concerning sediment flow rate. Each of these theories can be further sub-categorized into…
13.cn: 好，沉积速率有三个主要理论，每一个还可以细分为两个…

14.en: When Underwood loses, you'll spend the next two years fighting off a primary opponent. Every one of our 200,000 members in Ohio will turn on you.
14.cn: 等安德伍德输了，你接下来两年可就有仗要打了，我们在俄亥俄的二十万会员都会反对你。

15.en: Point of inquiry, given that Leonard is your secondary friend and Koothrappali is your primary friend, why didn't you seek refuge under his roof?
15.cn: 有个问题，既然莱纳德是你的第二好友，库萨帕里才是你的头号好友，你为什么没去他那？

16.en: I'm commending Governor Sally Morrison of the great state of Arizona, for giving us all such a good example of voting centers as used in their recent primary.
16.cn: 我赞扬伟大的亚利桑那州的州长萨莉·莫里森，因为她在最近的初选中为我们树立了，投票中心的好榜样。

17.en: Man, I feel sorry for them. Gotta run home to their owners! Not us. Now is back to our primary mission. The down fall of the human race. It is on, humans! It is on!
17.cn: 真为他们感到悲哀，得回家找主人。我们不用。现在要继续进行我们最重要的任务，毁灭人类。开战了，人类！开战了！
